name: Relationship Breakdown
text: You may flip to alter-ego form. While this card is in play, flip your hero-specific ally and supports facedown. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Luke Cage → remove Relationship Breakdown from the game and flip face-up each card that was flipped facedown by this obligation.

name: A New Kingpin
text: Diamondback is flooding the street with a new drug that gives superpowers, aiming to become the new Kingpin of Crime by hooking up other criminals. When Revealed: Give the villain 1 facedown boost card and a tough status card. [acceleration]

name: Diamondback
text: Toughness. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Diamondback would activate, seek an attachment from the encounter deck and reveal it. (Luke Cage's nemesis minion.)
flavor: If you fall in line behind me, I can hook you up.

name: Jacked-Up
text:
Attach to Diamondback, otherwise attach to the minion with the most remaining hit points and give them a tough status card. If you cannot attach this card, this card gains surge.
Attached character gets +2 hit points.

name: Diamond
text: Attach to the minion with the most remaining hit points without another copy of Diamond attached and give them a tough status card. If you cannot attach this card, this card gains surge. Diamond produces a second-long surge of energy in its consumer, followed by an unstoppable rush that lasts for hours.
